Detailed Description

This class provides interface to generate key pair. 

 gaia::security::KeyAttribute ka(gaia::security::AlgoType_RSA, 1024);
 gaia::security::KeyFactory kf(ka);
 EVP_PKEY* pKey;
 pKey = kf.generateKeyPair();
